title: Enable Gatekeeper
description: Preference Domain: com.apple.systempolicy.control - Gatekeeper is Appleâ€™s application white-listing control that restricts downloaded applications from launching. It functions as a control to limit applications from unverified sources from running without authorization.

EnableAssessment.title: Enable Gatekeeper Assessment
EnableAssessment.description: If true, enables Assessment of files and binaries on the system using Apple's Gatekeeper anti-malware utility.
